text: narakattil avarkaḷ taṅkaḷukkuḷ tarkkittuk koṇṭu, (avarkaḷil uḷḷa) palavīṉamāṉavarkaḷ perumaiyaṭittuk koṇṭirunta (talai)varkaḷai nōkki ‘‘meyyākavē nāṅkaḷ uṅkaḷaiyē piṉpaṟṟiyiruntōm. Iṉṟaiya tiṉam narakatti(ṉ vētaṉaiyi)liruntu oru ciṟitēṉum eṅkaḷai viṭṭu nīṅkaḷ taṭuttuviṭa muṭiyumā?'' Eṉṟu kēṭpārkaḷ
